text: Samur may refer to: ==People== * Samur Gunj (1380s-c.1455), a daughter of Elbeg Nigülesügchi Khan and his senior wife Kobeguntai ==Places== * Qaleh Samur, a village in Gavork-e Sardasht Rural District, in the Central District of Sardasht County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran * Samur, Azerbaijan, a village and municipality in the Qusar Rayon of Azerbaijan * Samur (river), a river in Azerbaijan and Russia * Samur, Vezirköprü, a village in the Vezirköprü district of Samsun Province, Turkey * Samur–Absheron channel, an irrigation channel in Azerbaijan * Samur-Yalama National Park, a national park of Azerbaijan ==Other== * FNSS Samur, Turkish amphibious armoured vehicle- launched bridge *SAMUR, an emergency medical service in Spain
title: Samur
